SXR-I Data Exchange modules¶

This module extends functionality in the h5py library to enforce the DataExchange format of the hdf5 file

class sxri_data_exchange.dataexchange.SXRIDataExchange(filename)[source]¶

class that maps to the DataExchange format from aps to a h5 file

add_process(name, description)[source]¶

Add a processing step to the provenance group

create_exchange_group(title, **kwargs)[source]¶

Create a wrapped exchange group in the root level group of the hdf5 file

create_measurement_group(**kwargs)[source]¶

Create a wrapped measurement group in the root level group of the hdf5 file

create_provenance_group(**kwargs)[source]¶

Create a wrapped provenance group in the root level group of the hdf5 file

find_exchange_group_by_name(name)[source]¶

return the exchange group with the given name

find_exchange_group_by_title(title)[source]¶

return the exchange group with the given title

get_pixel_size(measurement_number=0)[source]¶

Helper method to easily get the pixel size out of the measurement group with index measurement_number. Default is the first measurement group.

get_provenance_group(**kwargs)[source]¶

Get the wrapped provenance group

get_raw_exchange_group()[source]¶

The raw data collected at the beam line is always contained the zeroth exhange group

get_zp_distance(measurement_number=0)[source]¶

Helper method to easily get the zone plate distance out of the measurement group with index measurement_number. Default is the first measurement group.

print_groups()[source]¶

A method mostly useful for testing that just prints out the names of the top level groups in the file

wrap_existing_exchange_group(h5group, name, **kwargs)[source]¶

create ExchangeGroup objects for any groups that already exist in the hdf5 file. The first one is always to be the raw data taken from the detector

class sxri_data_exchange.dataset.Dataset(h5dataset, **kwargs)[source]¶

classdocs

class sxri_data_exchange.exchange.ExchangeGroup(h5group, name, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

ExchangeGroup class wraps a h5py.Group class and enforces some conventions in the DataExchange specification as implemented by the SXR-I branch line at the Australian Synchrotron

Add an attribute to the group

creates a dataset for this group enforcing naming and attribute conventions @param data a numpy array @param name for the dataset, default:”data”

creates a resizable string dataset useful for descritions, titles etc

get_num_arr_datasets()¶

return the number of numpy-like datasets in the group

set_dataset(name, data, **kwargs)¶

set a dataset

set_title(title)[source]¶

set the “title” dataset, creating it if it doesn’t exist. Dataset is a string representing the name of this exchange group

class sxri_data_exchange.exchange.ProcessedExchange(h5group, name='exchange', title='processed data', *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This variant of the exchange group is the for processed data Note, it’s possible we will want to change the implementation for this to be a separate hdf5 file and have this group as an external link

class sxri_data_exchange.exchange.RawExchange(h5group, name='exchange', title='raw data', *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

The raw data variant of the exchange group. In this group we expect one data set called ‘data’ containing all the diffraction data frames Data is an a*b*c*2048*2048 numpy array with a= number of frames on each position, b and c the ‘x’ and ‘y’ coordinates of each scan position We also have data_white_n and data_dark_n datasets containing the whitefiled and darkfields which correspond to each frame these will be of size 2048*2048 Attributes of the ‘data’ dataset called ‘white_field’ and ‘dark_field’ map a reference to a dark field frame and white field frame for each data frame. This should actually be a read-only group for us

class sxri_data_exchange.provenance.ProcessGroup(h5group)[source]¶

ProcessGroup wraps a ‘process’ subgroup which contains information describing each processing step that happens to in the data pipeline. It contains references to the input output data used.
